274237.「私は 列車が 大好きでねぇ。\n 人類の発明品の中で こいつが ピカイチさ。:
I just love trains. Out of all the inventions
of mankind, this one is easily the best.

274238.「これはね ４００年前……大陸間鉄道の\n 開通式に出席したとき くばられた\n:
I got this as a souvenir when I attended the
grand opening of the Intercontinental
Railroad 400 years ago...isn't it great?

274239.「まあ 出席したといっても\n 翼を隠し お忍びでなんだがね。:
Well, if you call attending blending in with
the crowd with your wings hidden.

274240.「天使や フォーリオンの存在は\n アストルティアの民に 秘匿されている。:
The existence of us angels and Fourion is a
kept secret from the people of Astoltia.

274241.「陰ながら 世界を見守るのが\n 祖先が ルティアナ様と交わした 約束なんだ。:
It was a promise that our ancestors made to
Lutiana that we would watch over the world
in secrecy.

274242.「英雄たちに 試練を課すのも 我らの使命……\n 世界の守護を まっとうするため:
Our mission is to put those who have shown
themselves as champions through many trials,
thus doing our part to protect the world.

274243.「ほぅ……やはり 美しいな。四天の星巡りを\n 乗り越えた 英雄の魂というものは:
Ah...it's truly a beautiful sight, isn't it?
The soul of a champion who has overcome the
Four Heavenly Trials.

274244.「まばゆい光に 満ちている。\n よくぞ 四天の星巡りを 突破してくれた。\n:
It dazzles with a brilliant light... Well done
on making it all the way through. Yuliza was
right about you.

274245.「前置きが 長くなったね……。\n 私は 聖天舎を預かる天使長 ミトラー。:
Sorry about that, I got a little carried
away... I am Mitra, Archangel and chief of
the Monastery.

274246.「まあ カンタンに言えば 四天の星巡りを\n つかさどる者たちの 長だ。:
To put it simply...I am the one who oversees
the Four Heavenly Trials.

274247.「お前の 突破してきた 四天の星巡りは\n 英雄の魂を きたえるためのもの\n:
The Four Heavenly Trials are meant to steel
the souls of champions...I wonder if you've
already realized that.

274248.「きたえぬかれた 魂のみが\n 我らの望む 高みへと 到達しうる。\n だから:
Only well-trained souls can reach the heights
that we desire. That is why we have high
expectations of you.

274249.「フォーリオンには お前に 反感を抱く者も\n 少なくないが……実力を 認めてい:
There are many in Fourion who aren't very fond
of you...but there are also many who recognize
your abilities. Be sure not to forget that.

274250.「さて……四天の星巡りを 乗り越えた者には\n 最後の仕上げとして みそぎを\n:
Now then...those who have passed the Four
Heavenly Trials will be asked to undergo a
purification ritual as the final step.

274251.「みそぎとは 偉大なるチカラを得る前に\n これまでの罪や ケガレを払う 儀式だ:
This purification is a way to purge your past
sins and impurities, and must be done so
before attaining the great power.

274252.「偉大なるチカラが いかなるものかは……\n みそぎを終えたあとに 明かすとしよ:
As for what that great power is... I will tell
you once the purification is complete.
Please wait here for just a moment.

274253.「みそぎは 浄罪の泉にて おこなえる。\n 聖天区画の 東にある建物を 目指すと:
The purification can be performed at the
Spring of Purity. You can find it in the
building east of the Holy Grounds.

274254.「ふーん。水がめから 流れる水を\n 浴びるだけで いいのかぁ……。:
Hmmm...so all I gotta do is just bathe
in the water coming from that jug...?

274255.「ええ。それが みそぎというものです。: Right. That's how you may purify yourself.

274258.「あ～。お前は そこで見ていなさい。\n アシュレイ殿の あとだ。あと。:
Hm. You just stand right there and watch
closely. You can go after Ashley. AFTER.

274259.「悪いな。すぐ すませるから！: Sorry about that. I'll be quick!

274260.「くっ くっせえ！ どうなってんだ？\n 汚れた水で みそぎを やれってのか！:
U-urgh! What is going on here? Do you really
expect me to purify myself in this nasty
water?!

274261.「まさか これも試練だって\n 言うんじゃ ないだろうな？\n 天使ってヤツぁ:
Don't tell me this is some kind of trial,
too?! That angel lady is so cruel!

274262.「ち ちがいますよ。試練じゃありません。\n こんなの 想定外のトラブルです！:
N-no, this is definitely no trial. This is
unexpected and it means trouble!

274263.「急ぎ 天使長に ご報告せねば！:
I must report this to the Archangel
immediately!

274264.「いやいや あんたが 持ち場を離れちゃ\n ダメでしょ。代わりに 俺らが行ってや:
No, no. You can't just up and leave this
place. We'll go instead.

274265.「おお！ それなら ぜひ！: Oh! Well, then, by all means!

274266.「というわけだ。俺は アシュレイ。\n 生前は 勇者をやっていた。:
Anyways...the name's Ashley. I was actually
a Hero before I died.

274267.「しかも 初代なんだぜ 初代！ \n 始まりの大魔王 ゴダを倒したのは\n 何を:
And I'm the first generation! The one who
defeated Goda, the very first Great Demon
King! Yeaah!

274268.<pc>は アシュレイに\n勇者の盟友であると 自己紹介した。:
<pc> introduced themselves to
Ashley as the Hero's ally.

274270.「いいじゃないか。\n 勇者と盟友で 仲良くやろうぜ！:
That's good, isn't it?
As Hero and ally, we'll get along just fine!

274271.「ぐおっ……臭いが キツくなってきたな。\n 鼻が 曲がらないうちに\n 聖天舎:
Guhh...the smell is getting even worse!
Let's go let the Archangel know about this
before our noses fall off!

274272.「……初代勇者と当代の盟友が そろって\n どういう了見だ？\n 私は みそぎを:
The first Hero, and the ally of this age...
What are you doing here? Did I not tell
you to undergo the purification ritual?

274273.「よもや 水浴びは冷たいから\n 気が進まんなどと ぬかすのでは あるまいな？:
Don't tell me you don't want to bathe in
those waters because it's too cold...?

274274.「冷たいだけなら よかったんだけどさ。\n ……なあ？:
It would've been fine if it were just
cold...yeah?

274275.<pc>は 浄罪の泉が 汚水まみれになり\nみそぎが できなくなったと 天使長に:
<pc> informed the Archangel that
the Spring of Purity had become so filthy,
that the purification ritual was not possible.

274277.「す すまない。天星郷 始まって以来の事故だ。\n 言葉を 失ってしまったよ……:
I...I'm sorry. This is the first time
something like this has happened in the
Firmament. I've no words...

274278.「いにしえの 大崩壊の日でさえ……\n 奴らに フォーリオンが 蹂躙されても\n:
Even during the days of the Ancient Collapse,
when Fourion was completely ravaged...
that water source had remained untouched.

274279.「それはひとえに 女神の加護が あったゆえ。\n もはや 加護は失われてしまった:
It was because of the blessing of the
Goddess. But now that the blessing is gone...

274280.「そんな 深刻にならんでも……。 \n 汚れたんなら キレイに掃除すれば\n い:
Why so serious all of a sudden? If it's dirty,
then just clean it up, yeah? I dunno.

274281.「切り替えが早いな。さすがは 初代勇者。\n ならば お前たちに 泉の浄化を頼む:
Quick to change the mood...you're no doubt the
first Hero. If that's so, I ask you to purify
the spring again. Well? Will do you it?

274282.「おいおい 冗談だろ。\n 俺らに ドブさらいをやれっての？:
Hey, I was just joking! You really want us
to go and clean up that mess?

274283.「人助けこそ お前の本分であろう？\n なぜなら 勇者なのだから……ってね。:
Helping people is your job, is it not?
Because you are a Hero...right?

274284.「困ってる私に 手を貸しておくれよ。:
I'm a person in trouble, and could really
use a hand.

274285.「それとも 我々が 泉を浄化するまで\n 神都の回生堂で 無為に時を過ごすかね？:
Or will you wait around idly while we take
our time purifying the spring again?

274286.「それは……ごめんだな。\n 退屈すぎて 二度目の死を 迎えそうだ。:
Well...I'm sorry. I'm just so bored that I
feel like I'm about to die a second time.

274287.「俺は 引き受けようと思う。\n お前も 手伝ってくれるよな？<yesno><c: I'll take care of it. You'll help me, yeah?<yesno><close>

274288.「え？ 今 なんて言った？\n よく 聞こえなかったんだけど。:
Huh? What was that? I couldn't hear
ya so well...

274289.「いいか？ もっかい 聞くぞ。\n お前も 手伝ってくれるよな？<yesno><:
Okay? I'll ask you again. You'll help me out,
yeah?<yesno><close>

274290.「よし きた！\n それでこそ 勇者の盟友だ。:
All right, it's settled! That's what being the
Hero's ally is all about!

274291.「では 浄化のほう よろしく頼むぞ。: Then I'll leave the purification to you.

274292.「どうやって 浄化するかは……そうだな。\n 前代未聞のことでもあるし\n 聖天:
As for how to purify it...hmm, let's see...
Since this is something unprecedented, the
Monastery's archives must have something.

274293.「えっ 丸投げなの！？: What?! You're leaving all that up to us?!

274294.「その通りだ。四天の星巡りの 延長戦とでも\n 思ってくれ。書庫は この聖天舎の:
Indeed. Think of it as an extension of the Four Heavenly Trials. You can find the study on the west side of the Monastery's second
floor. Go on, get moving.

274295.「ん……なんか みつけたのか？\n もしかして 浄化の方法が書いてある本か！:
Hm...? You find something? Could it be a
book on how to purify?!

274297.「えーと なになに……清めの大玉？\n こいつがあれば 汚れちまった泉を\n キ:
Let's see... Yadda, yadda...Purifying Orb?
Can we clean up the spring using that
thing?

274298.「で どこにあるんだ？ 清めの大玉とやらは。\n あんた 知ってるかい？:
So, where is it then? Hey, you. Do you know
where we can find the Purifying Orb?

274299.「いいえ わたくしも くわしくは……。 \n 知っているのは あらゆる汚れを 浄:
No, I'm just as clueless as you...but I do
know that it's made of an amazing substance
that purifies all kinds of filth.

274300.「使われた 記録がないので その薬品は\n 聖天舎にも ないかもしれません。:
There is no record of its use, so it may not
be in the Monastery at all.

274301.「でも ほら……作れるって 書いてあるぞ。\n 破邪の黒曜石ってのがあれば いい:
But, hey, look...it says here you can make
one. Looks like all you need is something
called Crushing Obsidian.

274302.「破邪の黒曜石ですか……あいにく\n フォーリオンじゃ 採れないんですよね。\n:
Crushing Obsidian...unfortunately, you won't
find it here in Fourion. I suppose you'd be
able to find it in Astoltia, though.

274303.「いいねぇ。観光がてら 行ってくるよ。\n 俺が生きていた時代と どれくらい\n:
That's great! I'm headed there for some
sightseeing. I wanna see how much has changed
since I was still alive.

274304.「えっ 知らないんですか？\n 英雄は 天星郷から 出られないんですよ。\n 魂:
What? Don't you know? Champions can't leave
the Firmament. Your life is just a temporary
one restored from your soul.

274305.「でも あなたの となりにいる人なら\n アストルティアにも 行けるでしょうね。:
But that individual next to you could probably
go to Astoltia. After all, they're still
alive.

274306.「お お前……そうか！\n 当代の盟友って 言ってたもんな。:
Oh, you...that's right! You said you were the
ally of this age!

274307.「生きながらにして 英雄って……。\n お前 なにげに すごい奴だったんだな。:
A champion that's still alive...you must've
been something pretty special, yeah?

274308.「俺には 行けないんじゃ しかたがない。\n 破邪の黒曜石の調達は お前にまかせ:
There's not much I can do I'm afraid, since I
can't go. I'll leave it to you to get that
Crushing Obsidian.

274309.「んー？ 首尾よく 材料が手に入っても\n 調合できる奴がいなきゃ 話にならんか:
Hmm...but even if we manage to gather the
ingredients, it'll do us no good if we don't
have someone to mix them together...

274310.「ウデのたつ薬師を 見つける必要があるなぁ。\n よし！ そっちは 俺が探しとく:
We need to find a doctor who knows their way
around mixing stuff! All right! Leave
finding them up to me!

274311.「にしても 破邪の黒曜石が\n アストルティアの どこにあるかが\n まだ 謎だ:
But that still leaves the Crushing Obsidian...
I have no idea where in Astoltia you can
find it...

274312.「そういうことでしたら こちらのケースに\n 保管された本も 調査に お役立てく:
If you'd like, you can use the books in this
display. They contain special information
regarding purifying the spring.

274313.「そこの キミ……。\n ちょっと いいかな？: You there...can I have a quick word?

274315.「ん……どうした？\n 何か言いたげな 顔をして……。\n<select_nc>:
Hm..? What's wrong? Your face looks like
you want to say something...
<select_nc>
Ashley...?
Ashley's...twin?

274317.「そうか！ 兄貴の知り合いか。\n アシュレイは 双子の兄でね……。:
I see! So you do know my brother, then.
Ashley and I are twins.

274318.「俺の名は レオーネ。\n 初代勇者の盟友だ。よろしくな。:
My name is Leone. I am the ally of the first
Hero. It's nice to meet you.

274319.「キミのような反応は 久々だよ。\n 天使たちは 皆 事情を知ってるからさ。:
It's been awhile since I've seen someone react
like you did just now. The angels around here
already know everything that's going on.

274320.「アシュレイの奴とは 別々に ここに来て\n 四天の星巡りでも あいつ 常に先行:
Ashley and I came here separately, and he was
always ahead of me in the Four Heavenly
Trials. I've yet to see him since.

274321.「フフ……でも 俺のことは\n しばらく 兄貴には内緒な。\n おどろかせてやろ:
Haha...but don't tell my brother that you
saw me here, all right? I'm gonna surprise
him.

274322.「見たところ キミも英雄のようだけど……。:
It looks to me that you're a champion too,
but...

274324.「四天の星巡りを始めたのは つい最近なのに\n ものすごい勢いで 追いあげる者が:
I've only recently started the trials, and I
heard that someone was catching up pretty
quick...that's you, isn't it?

274325.「会えて 光栄だ……っと しまった。\n 自分から聞いておいて 忘れてたよ。\n:
It's a pleasure to meet your...ah, darn it.
I asked you and then completely forgot.
Which way is the Monastery?

274326.「助かる。あとで ゆっくり話そう。\n じゃあね <pc>。:
Thanks. I'm sure we'll talk again later.
See you, <pc>.

274328.「けど ここから 水源までは\n けっこうな距離が ある上に\n 道中には 魔物:
But...it's a long way from here to the water
source...and there will be even more monsters
along the way.

274329.「勇者の本分は 人助け……か。\n ったく 言ってくれるな。時代が変わっても\n:
"Helping people is a Hero's job..." Yeah,
yeah, I got it. Some things never change
even though the times do.

274330.「俺らも よく 言われたよ。\n 大魔王を倒すのです。なぜなら……:
We used to be told that all the time.
"You must defeat the Great Demon
King, and that is because..."

274332.「レオ……レオーネなのか！\n ……昔のまんまじゃないか。: Le...Leone?! You haven't changed a bit!

274334.「夢みたいだよ お前も英雄として\n よみがえっていたなんて……。:
This is like a dream! I can't believe you've
also come back as a champion...

274335.「審判の天使たちが 何かにつけて\n 初代勇者のことを ほめそやすから\n こっ:
I already knew you were here, since the angels
were praising the first Hero at every chance
they got.

274336.「途中からは <pc>の名も\n よく 聞くようになったな。:
I've also heard your name a lot,
<pc>.

274337.「えっ 何？ お前ら 知り合いなの？: W-what? You guys know each other?

274338.「水臭いな。レオは 俺の弟なんだぜ。\n 教えてくれても よかったろ？\n<se:
Don't be so modest! Leo here is my brother.
You could've told me that, yeah?
<select_nc>
It was a secret.
You didn't ask.

274339.「内緒って なんだ そりゃ。: What kind of secret is that?!

274340.「お前の おどろく顔が 見たかったんだよ。\n それで 口止めしていたのさ。:
I wanted to see the surprised look on your
face. That's why they kept quiet.

274341.「その返しは ないだろ……。\n お前 意外と さめた奴なんだな。:
Well, you definitely got me there...
You're pretty sharp, you know that?

274342.「おかげで 兄貴の おどろく顔が見れた。\n ありがとな。:
It's because of you I got to see my brother's
surprised face. Thank you for doing that.

274343.「試練だの なんだの……流されるように\n こなしてきたけど こんな うれしいこ:
I've been going through the trials and
whatnot, just going with the flow...but I
never imagined this would've happened.

274344.「俺もだ……。また会えて うれしいよ。\n それと ふたりが神代の遺構に\n 入:
Me as well...it's really nice to see you
again. I'm glad we were able to meet up before
you went inside the Ancient Remains.

274345.「だいたいの事情は 天使長から聞いてる。\n 俺も 協力させてもらうよ。:
The Archangel brought me up to speed on what's
been going on. I'm willing to help you.

274346.「でもよ……ここには 魔物が出るらしい。\n 神話時代の遺跡に 住みついているっ:
But you know...there's apparently a bunch of
monsters in there. Supposedly they're all
holed up in those really old ruins...

274347.「どうせ ザコだろ？ 大魔王に比べりゃ\n どいつもこいつも 格下さ。死にはしな:
They're all just small fry, aren't they?
They're nothing compared to the Great Demon
King. I will not let you die.

274348.「そんな顔 するなって。\n もう ヘマはしないから。:
Don't give me that look. I won't make any
more mistakes.

274349.「バカ ちがうって。また お前と\n 肩を並べて戦えるって 思うとな……。:
You got it all wrong, dummy! Just the thought
of fighting side by side with you again...

274350.「じゃあ 行くとするか。目指すは 泉の水源だ。\n さくっと 浄化してこようぜ。:
Let's get moving, then. Our target is the
spring's water source. Let's go and purify
it quickly!

274351.「こいつらが 汚染源か……。\n 見るからに 不潔そうだな。:
So these guys are the source of all the
filth...? They look disgusting...

274352.「おい！ あれを壊されると\n マズイんじゃないのか？:
Hey! If that thing gets destroyed, wouldn't
we be in big trouble?

274353.「レオの 得意技だ。あれで 何度も助けられた。\n 大魔王ゴダと 戦ったときもな:
That's Leo's special skill...and it's saved my
life many times. Even while fighting Goda...

274354.「よし！ 今のうちに 奴らを しとめよう。\n １匹は俺がやる。もう１匹は 頼ん:
All right! Let's take 'em down while we still
have the chance! I'll take one, and you can
take the other!

274356.「うっわ！ それ 持ってくんだ？\n お前の趣味が わからないよ……。:
Hurgh! You're really gonna take that thing?
I guess I don't understand your interest...

274357.「さすがの 強さだね。\n まかせっきりにして すまない。:
You're quite strong. Sorry that I had to leave
it all to you.

274358.「何 言ってんの。お前のほうこそ\n 戦いたいのを ガマンして\n 守りを引き受:
What do you mean? You're the one who went
ahead and took on the job of defending us,
aren't you?

274359.「まっ これから先 戦う機会は\n いくらでも あるか。んじゃ 戻ろうぜ。:
Well, there'll be plenty more opportunities
for us to fight together in the future. Let's
head back.

274360.「おい 待て待て！\n 水源を 浄化しに来たんだよね？:
Hey, wait a second! We're here to purify the
water source, aren't we?

274361.「いっけね 忘れてたわ！\n <cs_pchero> アレだよ アレ。\n アレ:
Oh, jeez, I forgot! <cs_pchero>!
The thing! Use the thing!

274363.「まさか なくしたんじゃ ないよな？\n 早いとこ アレを使ってくれ！:
You didn't lose it, did you...? Come on,
hurry up and use it!

274365.<cs_pchero>は 清めの大玉を\n泉に 放り投げた。:
<cs_pchero> threw the Purifying Orb into
the spring.

274366.「すっげえ！ めちゃめちゃ キレイになったな。: Wow! It looks so clean now!

274367.「さっきまでの汚れが ウソみたいだね。\n こんなに キレイになるなんて\n 怖:
I can't believe how dirty it just was!
It's scary how clean everything looks
now...

274368.「上等じゃねえか。みそぎを するんだから\n キレイすぎるくらいで ちょうどいい:
That's just fine. We are having a purification
ritual after all, so we want it to be clean as
can be, yeah?

274369.「そんじゃ 浄罪の泉に 行くとするか。\n たしか 聖天区画にあったよな。急ごう:
Okay, then. Let's go to the Spring of Purity.
It's located in the Holy Grounds if I remember
correctly. Come on!

274370.「おお！ ようやく 戻られましたか！\n 見てください。この 透きとおった泉を！:
Oh! You've returned at last! Look at how
crystal clear the spring water is! Is it not
even more beautiful than it was before?

274371.「あなたがたが やってくれたそうですね。\n さすがは アシュレイと レオーネ！:
I heard that you are the ones who fixed this.
As expected of the great Ashley and
Leone!

274373.「みそぎは できるんだな？: We can do the purification now, right?

274374.「もちろん！ ささっ 女神像の前に\n 立ってください。水がめの水を\n 全身で:
Of course! Go and stand in front of that
statue of the Goddess. All you must do
is bathe your whole body in its waters.

274375.「たった それだけで いいのかい？: That's all we have to do?

274376.「おっと 英雄レオーネには\n 説明が まだでしたな。:
Whoops, looks like I forgot to explain it
to you.

274377.「みそぎとは 前世で おかした罪や\n 背負った ケガレを払う 儀式なのです。:
This purification is a ritual to purge the
impurities and sins from your past lives.

274378.「泉の水は ルティアナ様が流した 涙で\n できているという 言い伝えもありまし:
The legends say that the spring's waters are
made up from the tears that Lutiana once shed.
A nice blessing, don't you agree?

274379.「前世の罪……か。: The sins of our past life...?

274380.「それじゃ 女神ルティアナの\n ご利益に あやからせて もらうとするか。\n:
Okay! Let's rely on the blessings of the
Goddess herself! I'll go first, all right?

274381.「ほら 次は お前だ。\n もたもた してるんじゃない。: Hey, you're next. No dawdling, you hear?

274382.「その態度 あまりに無礼であろう。\n 泉を預かる者として 恥ずかしくないのか。:
There's no need to be so rude. You are the
overseer of this spring, aren't you? Have you
no shame?

274383.「四天の星巡り 突破できましたね！ あなたなら\n やりとげると 信じてました。:
I knew you could get through all of the Four
Heavenly Trials! I'll be watching your big
moment from back here.

274384.「いいよなぁ。アイツには\n 親身になってくれる 天使がいて。\n 俺には そん:
How nice...they get an angel that's actually
nice to them, and I don't... What about
you?

274386.「……なんとも 得体の知れないものですね。\n みそぎの さまたげになると いけ:
...it's quite mysterious. I don't want it to
interfere with your purification, so please
allow me to hold onto it.

274387.<pc>は 脈動する鉱石を\nユーライザに預けた。:
<pc> handed the Pulsating Ore to
Yuliza for safekeeping.

274388.「うんうん。みそぎは すんだようだね。\n お前たちが 輝いて見えるよ。:
Very good. It looks like the purification is
all finished. You all look so radiant.

274389.「おっ <pc>じゃないか！\n くぅう～ 先を越されていたなんてよぉ。\n 次:
Well, if it isn't <pc>! I can't
believe you beat me here! Next time, it'll
be me who beats youuuuuu!

274390.「バカ兄者！ 次なんて もうないだろ。\n 勝負は これっきりなんだよ。:
You big idiot! There IS no next time. This
is the last part of the contest.

274391.「……兄ちゃん 姉ちゃん。\n そもそも 四天の星巡りは競争じゃないよ……。:
Hey, you two...the Four Heavenly Trials isn't
a competition, you know...

274392.「さあ お前たちも みそぎをすませな。\n でないと 話が始まらないよ。:
Okay, now the rest of you must finish your
purification. After that, we can begin the
discussion.

274393.「……偉大なるチカラのことだな？\n ならば さっさと すませるとしよう。:
...about the great power, right? Then, let's
not waste another moment.

274394.「うむ。見違えたぞ 諸君。\n 生前の罪や ケガレは洗い流され\n 今 ここに:
Good. Everyone looks different. The sins and
impurities of your past lives have been washed
away, and your souls have been purified.

274395.「一度は 人生を まっとうした諸君に\n かりそめの命を与え 度重なる試練を課し:
I've given temporary lives to those of you who once lived, and put you through a series of trials. I don't blame you if you felt that was
unfair.

274396.「だが すべては アストルティアのため……。\n 七柱の種族神は いずれも 肉体:
But for the sake of Astoltia, all seven of the
race gods have either lost their body, or
are currently in eternal slumber.

274397.「……実体なき 信仰の対象としてのみの 神は\n 現実の危機に際し 無力。真に求:
...a god that exists merely as an object of worship is powerless in the face of real crisis. What we truly desire are gods that
can be protectors of this world.

274398.「今 明かそう！ 諸君に与えられる\n 偉大なチカラとは……\n 神のチカラ そ:
I reveal it to you now, the greatest power
that can be bestowed upon you...the power
of the gods themselves!

274399.「四天の星巡りとは 人の身である英雄を\n 神の高みに 昇らせることを目的とし\:
The Four Heavenly Trials are designed to raise
mortal champions to divine heights, and to
train their souls in the process.

274400.「いにしえより 我々 天使は 新たなる神の\n 候補たりうる者を求めて 様々な時:
Since time immemorial, we angels have gathered the souls of champions from various different time periods in search of potential candidates
for the new gods.

274401.「すべては 天星郷に伝わる 秘儀をもちいて\n 英雄を神化させるための 営みであ:
All of this was done to perform deification on
our champions using a secret ritual that's
been handed down in the Firmament.

274402.「近日 とりおこなわれる 神化の儀を経て\n 諸君は アストルティアを守る\n:
In a ritual that will be held shortly, you
will all take your place amongst the gods
who protect Astoltia.

274403.「新たなる神……うすうす そんなことだろうと\n 感じておりましたわ……。:
A new god...I had an inkling that might be
the case...

274404.「英雄といえど もとは ただの人。\n 神のチカラを 与えるなど……\n 許され:
But champions are still just people. To
give them the power of a god...is that
truly allowed?

274405.「その資質を見極めるための 四天の星巡りだ。\n 諸君は 見事 突破してきた。\:
The Four Heavenly Trials are meant to see if
you are qualified. You all passed splendidly,
so I have no doubts that you are.

274406.「とてつもない チカラを得ても なお\n 私は 私でいられるのかな……ふふっ。\:
Will I still be me after attaining such a
tremendous power, I wonder...?
Things sure are getting interesting...

274407.「……それぞれ 思うところはあろう。\n ただ 強制だけはしないと 約束する。:
I'm sure you all have your own thoughts on
this matter, and I promise I will not force
any of you to do anything you do not want.

274408.「諸君には 考える時間を与えよう。\n そして 神化の儀を受けるとの 同意を得た:
I will give you some time to think it over. If you then agree to undergo the ritual, I will light the last of the candles on your
Soul Candelabras.

274409.「特に <pc>……お前は\n 他の英雄とちがい 生きながらにして\n フォーリ:
Especially you, <pc>... Unlike the
other champions, you were invited to the
Firmament while still being alive.

274410.「神化とは すなわち 人間をやめること。\n その決断は 重かろう。受けるか 否:
Deification means you will no longer be human. You must not take this decision lightly. Whether you accept or deny it, I will
respect your choice.

274411.「儀式の準備が ととのいしだい 連絡する。\n それまで 神都の回生堂で 疲れを:
I will contact you all as soon as the ceremony is ready. Until then, you may use the rest spot inside the city to rest yourselves and
think about your decision.

274415.「そんな……これと 似たものが\n 確かに アルビデの手に ついていたのに……。:
It can't be...it's the same as whatever was
on the back of his hand...

274416.「でも この赤いアザ……\n まるで キズあとのよう……。: But this red bruise...it looks like a scar...

274417.「こんな植物……見たことがない。\n それに この感触……まるで 石のよう。:
I have never seen a plant like this before...
and this texture...it almost feels like it's
made of stone.

274418.「あなたから 預かっている\n これと似ていると 思いませんか？<yesno><:
Doesn't it look exactly the same as the one
you entrusted to me?<yesno><close>

274419.「やはり あなたも そう思いますか……。: I thought you'd think so, too...

274420.「そうでしょうか……\n 私は 似ていると思うのですが……。: I see...I think they look similar, but...

274421.「どちらにせよ アルビデが\n 偶然 ここに来て 死んだとは思えない。:
Regardless, I do not believe Albide came here
and died by accident.

274422.「水源に現れた魔物が 落としたものと\n アルビデの左手に 付着していたものが\:
If what that monster from the water source
dropped is the same as what was stuck to
the back of Albide's hand, then...

274423.「みそぎもジャマされたし 深翠の試練では\n 予期せぬ 事故があったとも\n フ:
Fedira told me that the purification was
interrupted and that there was an unexpected
situation during the Deep Green Trials.

274424.「気味が悪い……。まるで 神化の儀を\n さまたげようとする 意思が働いてるかの:
I feel an ominous vibe...it's like there's
someone or something trying to put a stop
to the deification ritual.

274425.「これは……私の手には 負えない。\n 死者が出てる以上 天使長の判断を\n あ:
But this...this is out of my hands. As there
is a casualty involved, I must report this to
the Archangel.

274426.「私は 聖天舎に戻り\n この件を 天使長に報告します。:
I'll return to the Monastery and report this
immediately.

274427.「アルビデを このままにしておくのは\n 心苦しいですが いったん ここを出まし:
It pains me that we must leave Albide here
like this, but we need to hurry and get out
of this place.

274428.「なにやら 天使と一緒になって\n 調べ物をしていた そうじゃないか。:
I heard that you and that angel were doing
some investigating.

274429.「誰かのために あくせく\n 走り回るところが いかにも 盟友らしい。:
Running around and working tirelessly for
someone else's sake is truly someone who
is a loyal ally.

274430.「皮肉で 言ってるんじゃないよ。\n 俺だって 勇者の盟友と\n 呼ばれていたか:
That's no sarcasm, either. I've been called
the Hero's ally too, you know.

274431.「だからなのかな……。\n キミには 近しいものを感じるんだ。:
Maybe that's why...I feel a sort of closeness
towards you.

274432.「俺が生きていたのは 太古の昔……\n 始まりの大魔王ゴダの 侵攻があった時代だ:
I lived back during ancient times...back
during the invasion of the first Great Demon
King, Goda. I spent most my life fighting.

274433.「家を焼かれ 死体の山が築かれ……\n 人類の領土が 徐々に 削られていく。\n:
Homes burned, bodies piled up, and human
settlements slowly whittled away. Our lives
were a living hell.

274434.「それに比べて 今はどうだ？\n 聞けば 大魔王の侵略を 最小限の被害で\n お:
How does that compare to now? I heard that you
held off the Great Demon King's invasion with
minimal damage caused.

274435.「当代の 勇者と盟友は すごいよ。\n 俺たちには できなかった芸当だ……。:
The Hero and ally of this age are really
something. If only we could say the same
about us...

274436.「……なあ キミは この時代に\n 盟友として生を受け しあわせだったかい？<y:
...say, were you happy to be born as an ally
during this time period?<yesno><close>

274437.「そうか……キミにも それなりの苦労が\n あったんだろうに……。\n 素直に:
I see...you must've had your fair share of
hardships, too. It really is a virtue to be
able to answer so honestly.

274438.「しあわせと 言いきれないか……。\n まあ……盟友の 宿命かもしれないね。:
Can't say that you're happy, huh...
Well...that might just be our fate as allies.

274439.「おっ！ ふたりとも\n こんなところに いたのか。: Oh! What are you two doing here together?

274440.「さっき 使いの天使が やってきてな\n 明日 神化の儀をやるってさ。:
A messenger angel came to me just now and told
me that the deification ritual will be held
tomorrow.

274441.「まいっちゃうよな。英雄なんて ご大層な\n 肩書きで 復活させられたってだけで:
It's just too much, isn't it? I just can't
help but wonder why they'd revive me with such
a fancy title like "champion".

274442.「なのに 今度は 神さまだぜ！ 神さま！\n あのグランゼニス神と 対等になるの:
And now we're talking about gods here! Gods!
To think we're on equal footing with even Gran
Zenith...

274443.「よおよお グランゼニスぅ。\n お前は 相変わらず 寝坊助だなぁ！\n 最近:
Hey, hey! Gran Zenith! You're still the same
old sleepyhead! You haven't been slacking
off, have you?

274444.「新米の神と 種族神じゃ 格がちがうだろ。\n なめたクチをきくと 痛い目 見る:
There is a difference between a new god and a
race god. Be careful what you say, or you
might just learn to regret it.

274445.「とはいえ グランゼニス神は 俺らの時代でも\n お姿を 見せなくなっていたか…:
Then again, Gran Zenith was nowhere to be seen
even during our time...

274446.「……天使長の話からすると グランゼニス神は\n いまだ 眠ったままのようだね。:
From what the Archangel said, it seems Gran
Zenith is still asleep. I suppose we don't
have to worry about any consequences, then...

274447.「にしても 神さまかぁ……\n アシュレイ神……悪くない ひびきだ！:
But still...a god...Ashley, the mighty...
It rolls right off the tongue!

274448.「でも 他のみんなは 神になることに\n いろいろと 思うところが あるみたいだ:
But everyone else seems to have their own
thoughts on the whole becoming a god thing.

274449.「そうかぁ？ どいつも こいつも\n 前夜祭だとか言って 大さわぎしてるぜ。\n:
Is that right? Everyone is making a big fuss,
saying its a celebration before the ritual.
But no one really seemed to look troubled.

274450.「まあ そんなワケだからさ お前らも\n しんみりしてないで 下に来いよ。\n:
Come on, you guys shouldn't look so down in
the dumps! Come on downstairs! Let's spend
the whole night together!

274452.英雄たちの宴は 大いに盛りあがった。\nある者は歌い ある者は踊り\nそれぞれに:
The champions' celebration was lively and
spirited. Some sang while others danced, each
enjoying a delightful evening...

274454.「昨日は 調査に つきあっていただき\n ありがとうございました。:
I wanted to say thank you for helping me
yesterday.

274455.「こんなときですが……手伝ってもらった\n あなたには 聞いてもらいたいのです。:
Even at a time like this...you still helped
me. There's something I also want to tell you.

274456.「あのあと アルビデの死を 天使長に報告し\n 奇妙な石も 証拠として 提出しま:
After we returned, I reported Albide's death
to the Archangel and handed over the strange
stone as evidence.

274457.「でも……立ち入り禁止の危険地帯で\n 起こったことだけに ただの事故死として\:
But...because it happened in a dangerous and
off-limits area, the death was ruled simply
as accidental.

274458.「神化の儀が 目前に迫ってるので\n おおごとには したくないのでしょうね……。:
I suppose they don't want to cause a scene
from that ordeal, seeing as the deification
ritual is almost here...

274459.「ならばこそ なおのこと 原因を究明しなければ\n ならないはず！ この件を う:
The situation is even more dire than we thought, so we must investigate further! The ritual should not proceed while this matter
is left unresolved!

274460.「あっ いえ……今のは聞かなかったことに……。\n 聖天舎の一員として あるまじ:
Oh, um...please forget what I just said...
That was a rude remark from a member of the
Monastery.

274461.「さあ あなたを追い返した 無礼者に\n ぎゃふんと 言わせてやりましょう！:
Come on! We need to give that man who turned
you away a good scolding!

274462.「おや ヘルヴェル様。いかがされましたか？:
Oh, Miss Helvel. To what do I owe this
pleasure?

274463.「刻限を過ぎても 英雄が そろわなくてな。\n 残り ２名なんだが 見ていないか:
Time is running out and the champions are
still not gathered. There are two missing.
Have you seen them?

274464.「いやぁ どうでしたかねぇ？\n あなた方と ちがって ひとりひとり\n 英雄を:
Well, that is to say, um...unlike you, I don't
really know what each and every champion
looks like...

274465.「ん……そうか。\n では うしろを向いてみろ。:
Hmm...is that right...?
You might want to look behind you.

274467.「なぜ <pc>を 追い返したのです？\n どういうことか 説明しなさい！:
What is your reason for turning <pc>
away?! Explain yourself!

274468.「い 言いがかりは よしてくれ。\n まさか その 平凡を絵に描いたような奴が\:
D...don't be silly! No one in their right
mind would think someone like THAT is
a champion.

274469.「しらじらしいッ！ わかっていて\n のけ者にしたのでしょう！:
How shameless! You knew exactly what you were
doing, and turned them away on purpose!

274470.「弁解の余地も ないようだな。\n ならば 謝罪し 非礼を詫びよ。:
It seems you've no excuse. You should
apologize for being rude.

274472.「ひとつ 許してやってくれ。\n この件は 解決ということで よいな？:
I'll forgive you just this once. Let's just
consider this matter resolved, shall we?

274473.「……ヘルヴェル様。\n あなたこそ よいのですか？:
Miss Helvel...
Are you really sure?

274474.「我らの祖先は ルティアナ様が\n このアストルティアを\n お創りになるのを:
Our ancestors witnessed the creation of this
Astoltia by the great Lutiana herself.

274475.「女神は 我らを導く光であったお方。\n その 尊き光が この者の過失によって\:
The Goddess was the light that guided us...
and that precious light has been taken from
us by THEIR mistakes!

274476.「このような 大逆の徒に\n 神化の儀を受けさせるなど 言語道断！:
To allow such a person to go through the
deification ritual is nothing short of
ridiculous!

274477.「……女神を思う気持ちは よくわかった。\n そなたと 同じ思いを抱える同胞が\:
...I understand your strong feelings. I also
know that many others share the same
sentiments as you do.

274478.「こここ…こいつがッ！\n こいつのせいで ルティアナ様が！！:
It...it's all their fault! They're the reason
Lutiana is gone!!

274479.「黙れ！ 女神が お創りになった 世界を守る。\n すべてにおいて優先される 我:
Quiet! Our duty above all else is to protect
the world that she created.

274480.「貴様も天使なら こころざしの高さで\n 私情を 乗り越えてみせよ！:
If you're to call yourself an angel, you must
not let personal feelings sway your heart!

274481.「ユーライザ その者をともない\n 天の聖壇へ お行きなさい。\n お前も 神化:
Yuliza...please go with them to the Heavenly
Altar. You may witness the deification ritual
if you so wish.

274482.「私は 英雄フォステイルを 探しにいく。: I'm off to search for Fostail.

274484.「……すでに 始まっているようですね。\n 彼らの儀式が 終わるのを待ちましょう:
...it looks like it's already started. Let's
wait for them to finish first.

274485.「……四天の星巡りによって みがかれ\n そして みそぎによって 清められた\n:
Through the Four Heavenly Trials and your
purification, your souls are now qualified to
ascend to the heights of godhood.

274486.「かりそめの 血肉を捨て\n 女神が創りたもうた この世界を支える\n あらたな:
Do you swear to cast aside your temporary
flesh and blood, and become a new pillar to
uphold this world the Goddess has created?

274487.「よろしい。魂の燭台に 最後の炎を！:
Very well. I shall light the final flame of
your Soul Candelabras!

274488.「続いて 誓いの証として\n 魂の燭台を 神化の光炉に投げ入れよ。:
Now, as proof of your oath, you must cast
your Soul Candelabra into the Furnace of
Deification.

274489.「俺から やらせてくれ。: Please allow me to go first.

274490.「フォステイルは まだ 来ませんね。\n 何か あったのでしょうか……。:
Fostail still hasn't arrived yet...
I wonder if something's happened...

274491.「その神化の炎は 霊的には 諸君の分身であり\n かつ 神化を促す 触媒でもある:
The Flame of Deification is your spiritual
avatar, and the catalyst of your deification.
Now, accept the flame unto yourselves.

274492.「今 ここに アストルティアを守護する\n 八柱の神々が 顕現した！:
And now, the eight gods who will be the
guardians of Astoltia!

274493.「これが 神のチカラ……。\n オレたちの願いを かなえるチカラか。\n 身の内:
This is...the power of a god...the power to
grant our desires...I can feel the
overwhelming supremacy surging through me...

274494.「オレは このチカラで……\n みずからの過ちを 正してみせよう。\n ドワチャ:
I will use my power to right my own wrongs...
I will restore the lands of Dwachakka to its
rightful glory!

274495.「アタシたちは ドワチャッカの神となる。 \n フフッ……愚かなる歴史に 終止符:
We will become the gods of Dwachakka...and
we will put an end to this silly history!
We'll crush anything that gets in our way!

274496.「ドワチャッカ大陸を あるべき姿にィ！\n ボク……ワクワクしてきたよぉおおおッ:
Dwachakka in its former glory...! I'm...
I'm so excited!!

274497.「大切なものを ただ 守りたかった……。 \n だからこそ 己のすべてを かけて:
I only wished to protect that which was important to me... That is why I decided to risk everything and face the King of Calamity
alone...

274498.「だが どうだ？ 友は死に 国は滅びた！\n 抗うことが 苦痛を長引かせるだけな:
But for what...? My friends are dead, my country is destroyed...! If resistance only prolongs the pain, then I believe it is best
to just end everything with my own hands...

274499.「ああ……我が身を満たす 甘美なるチカラ。\n なんと すばらしい！:
Ah...what a sweet power flowing through my
body...it's simply wonderful!

274500.「このチカラで わたくしは\n なにより愛した かの国を……\n 滅ぼすことと:
With this power, I will destroy that country
in which I love so dearly... <heart>

274501.「人類なぞ 大魔王に 滅ぼされるべきだった。\n あの戦いを生き抜いた 兄貴なら:
Humanity should have been destroyed by the
Great Demon King. As a survivor, dear
brother...you should understand, no?

274502.「ああ……イヤというほど 思い知った。\n ひとりひとりは 善でも 群れると悪に:
Yeah...I've come to understand that all too well. As individuals, we are good...but when they join together, evil reveals itself. And
when there is peace, the people fight amongst themselves for it.

274503.「共通の敵がいるうちは 結束してたのに……。:
As long as we had a common enemy, we were all
united...

274504.「人間ってのは つくづく 度しがたいね。\n このチカラで 世界を一変させよう。:
Humans really are irredeemable creatures.
Let's use this power to change the world.

274505.「お前らッ！！ 偉大なるチカラで\n 世界を作り変えようぜ！:
Everyone! Let's remake this world with our
newfound power!

274506.「新しき世界のために！！: For the sake of a new world!!

274507.「……ラダ・ガートよ。\n おぬしは 正気なのだな？:
Lada Gart...has your mind been swayed as
well?

274508.「ああ 正気だとも……\n だからこそ 俺は待っている。\n <cs_pcher:
Yes, it has not been swayed...which is why
I am waiting... Waiting for <cs_pchero>
to become a god themselves!

274509.「さあ お前も神になれ。\n 俺とお前で 天星郷を滅ぼそう。:
Now, you too must become a god. Let us destroy
the Firmament together.

274510.「俺なんかを 英雄に選んだ挙句\n 絶大なるチカラを 授けてしまう……\n 愚か:
Let us bring justice to these foolish angels
who chose me as a champion...and then
bestowed upon me this great power.

274511.「どうした 怖れているのか？\n この神秘を体験すれば 世界が 一変するぞ。\n:
What is it? Are you afraid? Once you experience this mystical power, the world shall endure great change. There is no need
to hesitate. Once you experience it for yourself, then you will understand.

274512.「そうだな……。神のチカラの一端を\n 見せてやる。その身で味わえば\n お前も:
I see...I will show you but a glimpse of this
divine power. Once you taste it for yourself,
you too will desire it for yourself!

274514.「こんな俺に 過ぎたチカラを与え\n 見せかけの希望を 与えようとする\n 天使:
I'm truly disgusted at these angels who've
offered someone like me this great power,
and given a false sense of hope.

274515.「手に入れたチカラで 愚かなる天使どもに\n 鉄槌を下す！ お前も 手を貸してく:
I will strike down these fools with the power
they have given me, and I need your help!

274516.「どうした 怖れているのか？\n この神秘を体験すれば 世界が 一変するぞ。\n:
What is it? Are you afraid? Once you experience this mystical power, the world shall endure great change. There is no need
to hesitate. Once you experience it for yourself, then you will understand.

274517.「そうだな……。神のチカラの一端を\n 見せてやる。その身で味わえば\n お前も:
I see...I will show you but a glimpse of this
divine power. Once you taste it for yourself,
you too will desire it for yourself!

274518.「神のチカラを見せると 言いながら\n このざまでは 立つ瀬がないな。:
Despite saying I would show you this divine
power, it seems that it was not enough.

274519.「お前ほどの剛の者に 神のチカラを\n 欲する気持ちを 抱かせるには\n もっと:
It seems I must be more serious in my efforts
to sway someone as strong as you into
accepting this power for yourself.

274520.「見るがいい！ <cs_pchero>！\n これが 神のチカラだ！！:
Behold, <cs_pchero>!
This is the power of a god!!

274521.「な……なんという 禍々しさだ。\n あんなものが まともな神であろうはずがない:
S...such a horrifying aura...how could such a
being be called a proper god?

274522.「あれは 悪しき神……悪神だ！！: That is a god of evil...a fiend!!

274523.「どうだ？ ほしくなってきたろう。\n この すばらしき 神のチカラぁあああ！！:
Well? Do you not desire it? This is the
amazing power of a god!!

274525.「その身に刻まねば わからぬか。\n 神のチカラ とくと 味わうがいい！\n 必:
You must feel it course through your body to
truly understand it. Now, taste the power of
a god! Surely, it will beguile you!

274526.「神化の儀は 失敗だったのでしょうか。\n 手順にのっとって おこなったのに……:
Was the deification ritual a failure...?
Everything was followed according to
procedure...

274528.「確かなのは 英雄たちが 邪悪な何かに\n 変質してしまった ことだけだ。:
All we know right now is that our champions
have transformed into beings of evil.

274529.「倒れても なお 邪悪な気を放つか……。\n これ以上 暴れられては シャレにな:
Even downed, he's still emanating an evil energy...it would be troublesome if he's not kept under control. If we're to contain
him, we must do it now while he's weakened.

274530.「そんな！ 復活させるのに\n あれだけ 苦労したんですよ！:
No way! We went through so much just to
revive him!

274531.「やむをえまい……ラダ・ガートを 魂に戻す。:
We have no choice...Lada Gart must return to
only a soul.

274532.「以前は こんな色ではなかった……。\n この にごりを 除去しないかぎり\n:
It was not this color before...I can't revive
him again until this evil energy is removed.

274533.「我々は とんでもないものを\n 世に 解き放ってしまいました。\n 悪神を野放:
We've unleashed something terrible upon this
world. We can't just let those fiends run
amok.

274535.「ただちに <cs_pchero>に\n 神化の儀をおこない 神となさしめましょ:
Allow <cs_pchero> to undergo
deification immediately. Then, they can go
forth and subdue those fiends.

274536.「バカを言え！ 悪神を 増やすだけだ。\n 失敗の原因だって わかってないんだぞ:
Nonsense! You'll just create another fiend!
We don't even know why the ritual failed
in the first place!

274537.「この者と 他の英雄には ひとつ大きな\n ちがいがあります。それは 生者である:
There is one big difference between them and
the other champions...they still live.

274538.「生者の魂なら 神化の儀に\n 成功するのでは ないでしょうか。:
If their soul is still alive, would the
deification ritual not succeed?

274539.「手を こまねいていても\n 状況は悪くなる 一方です 天使長！:
Simply standing around and doing nothing
will just make the situation worse, Archangel!

274540.「……ダメだ。許可できない。\n まずは ラダ・ガートの魂を調べ\n にごりの原:
...no. I can't allow that. We first must
examine Lada Gart's soul to determine
what caused it to stain.

274541.「その過程で なぜ 神化の儀が\n 失敗に終わったのかが 見えてくるかもしれん。:
While we examine it, we may find out why the
ritual failed.

274542.「何ひとつ わからぬまま 儀式を強行しても\n いたずらに 傷口を 広げるだけだ:
Forcing them to undergo the ritual without
knowing the cause is just going to needlessly
bring more trouble...

274543.「神化の儀は ひとまず 中断とする。\n 皆 それぞれの 持ち場に戻るように。\:
The deification ritual will be suspended for the foreseeable future. Everyone should return to their duties, and stand by for further
instruction.

274544.「聞いてのとおり 神化の儀は ひとまず中断だ。:
As you just heard, the deification ritual has
been suspended indefinitely.

274545.「最悪な状況の中で よく ラダ・ガートを\n 無力化してくれた。私から 礼をさせ:
You did well to put a stop to Lada Gart under
such terrible circumstances. Please take
this as my thanks.

274546.「……フォステイルが ついに\n 姿を現さなかったのも 気になるな。\n こちら:
I'm also concerned that Fostail never showed
up...but we'll have to deal with that later.

274547.「ゆくえをくらませた 悪神どもが\n おとなしく しているはずがない。\n 遠か:
The fiends that have run off will not sit
around quietly. They will start to bring
destruction to the world before long.

274548.「我々も 悪神のゆくえを 全力で追う。\n 彼らのゆくえが つかめたときは お前:
We will do our best to track them down. When
we can pinpoint where they are, please lend
us your help once again.

274685.「あなたは 回生堂に戻ってください。\n 神化の儀を おこなうとの連絡が\n そ:
You should return to the rest spot. You will
probably be notified soon that the deification
ritual is ready.

274686.いよいよ 神化の儀の当日だ。\n聖天区画の北側にある 天の聖壇への昇降機で\n天:
The day of the deification ritual has come.
Take the elevator to the Heavenly Altar in
the northern part of the Holy Grounds.

276977.「そして ルティアナ様までが 世を去られた。\n ここに至り 我らは 四天の星巡:
Even Lutiana has left this world...and thus, we were compelled to begin the Four Heavenly Trials and the deification ritual sooner than
we anticipated.

287658.「天使の誘いに乗り 天星郷に導かれたのが\n そもそもの 誤りだったのだ。\n:
It was a mistake from the beginning to be led
here to the Firmament...because I am no
champion.

287659.「無邪気に 夢を追い求めた 結果\n 娘や仲間が 犠牲となり果て のうのうと\n:
I chased my dreams, and due to my foolishness,
my daughter and my companions were sacrificed,
leaving only me as a survivor.

287660.「名君と呼ばれて 歴史に名を刻んだが……\n 他者の犠牲の上に あぐらをかく 愚:
I was hailed as a great ruler, leaving my mark on history...but what ruler foolishly rests on his laurels at the sacrifices of others?!
How can I be called a champion?!

287661.「だが 加減を誤って 命を奪ってしまう\n やもしれぬ。その時は 恨んでくれるな:
However...I may misjudge you and take your
life. You mustn't blame me if that happens!

287662.「天使の誘いに乗り 天星郷に導かれたのが\n そもそもの 誤りだったのだ。\n:
It was a mistake from the beginning to be led
here to the Firmament...because I am no
champion.

287663.「無邪気に 夢を追い求めた 結果\n 娘や仲間が 犠牲となり果て のうのうと\n:
I chased my dreams, and due to my foolishness,
my daughter and my companions were sacrificed,
leaving only me as a survivor.

287664.「名君と呼ばれて 歴史に名を刻んだが……\n 他者の犠牲の上に あぐらをかく 愚:
I was hailed as a great ruler, leaving my mark on history...but what ruler foolishly rests on his laurels at the sacrifices of others?!
How can I be called a champion?!

287665.「だが 加減を誤って 命を奪ってしまう\n やもしれぬ。その時は 恨んでくれるな:
However...I may misjudge you and take your
life. You mustn't blame me if that happens!
